Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions

Class CardSelectorController

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions.CardSelectorController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputSource
public class CardSelectorController extends Object implements InputSource

Gathers user-input from an instance of DeckPanel (internal class of GamePanel) active on the Graphical User Interface.

When a user clicks on a card's picture, depending on which constructor this controller was instantiated by :

- Displays the RenderedCard as selected (boldened border)

- If this controller's constructor was given an instance of InputMediator, also sends to it the integer corresponding to the card's position in the list of choosable rendered cards. Used for choosing cards directly using their pictures instead of a menu made of buttons. This integer corresponds to a choice in the Menu containing all choosable cards ordered the same way.

Can be in concurrence with Std input : see ConcreteInputMediator::makeChoice(Menu). The first instance of InputSource to post rules over all others.

See Also:
  • GamePanel.CardsPanel.DeckPanel

  • Field Details

    • inputMediator

      private InputMediator inputMediator

      The instance of InputMediator that is awaiting for an integer choice and managing the concurrence between all views.

      If null, the controller is not used for making a choice and transfer it to the model : it is only used to display a card as selected, interacting only with the GUI view.

      See Also:
      • CardSelectorController(List, GamePanel, InputMediator)
      • CardSelectorController(List, GamePanel)
      • InputMediator
      • InputMediator::wait()
      • InputMediator::makeChoice(Menu)
      • InputMediator::receive()

    • jList

      private List<RenderedCard> jList

      The list of RenderedCard covered by this controller.

      - If the controller is used for making a choice to transfer to the model, only choosable cards are covered.

      - Otherwise, any card can be selected, since it is disconnected from the model and has holds sway only on the GUI view.

    • thisControllersMLMap

      private Map<RenderedCard,MouseListener> thisControllersMLMap
      This map associates, to each RenderedCard covered by this controller, one MouseListener. It is used for killing only the MouseListeners created by this instance of controller, once a choice has been made.
      See Also:
      • MouseListener
      • destroyThisControllersMouseListeners()

  • Constructor Details

    • CardSelectorController

      public CardSelectorController(List<RenderedCard> jList, GamePanel gp)

      With this constructor, this controller is not used for making a choice and transfer it to the model : it is only used to display a card as selected, interacting only with the GUI view.

      Creates a MouseListener for each RenderedCard : on click, displays a card as selected.

      These MouseListeners will remain active as long as the concerned are displayed. The GamePanel creating this controller can decide to kill all MouseListeners of each RenderedCard covered by this controller.

      Parameters:
      jList - Value for field jList
      gp - The instance of GamePanel (GUI view) instantiating this controller.
      See Also:
      • GamePanel::setSelectedCard(RenderedCard)
      • destroyAllMouseListeners()
      • MouseListener

    • CardSelectorController

      public CardSelectorController(List<RenderedCard> jList, GamePanel gp, InputMediator im)

      With this constructor, this controller is used for making a choice and transfer it to the model using directly their pictures instead of a menu made of buttons.

      Creates a MouseListener for each choosable RenderedCard : on click, sends to the linked instance of InputMediator} ,the integer corresponding to the card's position in the list of choosable rendered cards. This integer corresponds to a choice in the Menu containing all choosable cards ordered the same way.

      The clicked RenderedCard will therefore be marked as chosen.

      Once the choice is made, the MouseListeners (created by this controller only) will be killed.

      Parameters:
      jList - Value for field jList
      gp - The instance of GamePanel (GUI view) instantiating this controller.
      im - Value for field inputMediator
      See Also:
      • Menu
      • InputMediator
      • InputMediator::makeChoice(Menu)
      • InterruptibleStdInput
      • InputSource
      • GamePanel::cardHasBeenChosen(RenderedCard)
      • destroyThisControllersMouseListeners()
      • MouseListener

  • Method Details

    • destroyAllMouseListeners

      public void destroyAllMouseListeners()

      Kills all MouseListeners associated with every RenderedCard covered by this controller.

      Called by the view on permanent controllers when a deck's content is updated, as some cards are going to stop being displayed by the panel.

    • destroyThisControllersMouseListeners

      private void destroyThisControllersMouseListeners()

      Kills all MouseListeners created by this controller only.

      Called by this class itself choice has been made.

      This way, MouseListeners used only for highlighting clicked cards and not updating the model, are not destroyed.

      See Also:
      • thisControllersMLMap Map storing the controllers created by this controller only
